title: Global markets open 2025 cautiously
summary: Stock markets worldwide opened 2025 cautiously amid uncertainty over inflation, interest rates, and geopolitical risks.

title: Ukraine reports continued Russian missile attacks
summary: Ukrainian authorities reported continued Russian missile and drone attacks targeting energy infrastructure.

title: China signals further economic stimulus
summary: Chinese officials indicated additional stimulus measures to support slowing economic growth.

title: Red Sea shipping disruptions persist
summary: Global shipping firms continued rerouting vessels due to security risks in the Red Sea.

title: US Congress debates federal budget priorities
summary: Lawmakers in Washington debated federal spending levels ahead of budget deadlines.

title: Severe winter storms hit northern Europe
summary: Heavy snowfall and freezing temperatures disrupted transport across parts of northern Europe.

title: IMF warns of uneven global recovery
summary: The IMF warned that global economic recovery remained uneven due to debt and geopolitical pressures.

title: Tech firms report rising AI investments
summary: Major technology companies reported increased capital spending on artificial intelligence infrastructure.

title: Protests over cost of living spread in Latin America
summary: Demonstrations erupted in several Latin American countries over inflation and living costs.

title: Oil prices end January higher
summary: Oil prices rose by the end of January amid supply concerns and geopolitical tensions.
